name: Zoom Bible Study
description: We continue our weekly Adult Bible Study online through Zoom. Contact Pastor MJ Fitch at pastormj02@gmail.com for information on how to join the Zoom meeting. Currently we are studying Max Lucado’s book, "Facing Your Giant" about the life of David.

img.alt: Cover for Max Lucado - Facing Your Giants
